(1) В попытке уговорить мужа последовать: (1) in an attempt to persuade her husband to follow her son's example, frau herfurt dies of a heart attack, but manfred does not even come to say goodbye to her. (2) Finally, Manfred invites her to his house: he has found a job and can now provide for the family's life. (3) They meet in West Berlin, but nothing attracts Rita in this strange city. (4) "In the end, it all comes down to food, drink, clothes and sleep," she would later tell Schwarzenbach. (5 — - I asked myself the question: why do they eat? (6) What do they do in their fabulously luxurious apartments? (7) Where do people go in such big cars? (8) And what do people in this city think about before going to bed?» A girl can't betray her ideals and work only for money. (9) And in Manfred's action, she sees not strength, but weakness, not protest, but a desire to escape from temporary difficulties, as it seems to her. (10) She is hurt by the phrase: "They can't split the sky, thank God!" (11) Horrified by his mercantilism, she returns to the GDR, where the Meternagel team has dramatically increased productivity, now inserting fourteen windows per shift instead of the previous eight. \"(1) Начало поставок самолёта Sukhoi Su: "(1) The start of deliveries of the Sukhoi Superjet 100 (SSJ-100) aircraft has been postponed to the second half of 2010. (2) This was stated by the President of the United Aircraft Corporation (UAC) Alexey Fedorov, Interfax reports. (3) The specific timing of the start of deliveries, he said, is still being discussed. (4) It was previously planned that Superjet would start operating commercial flights at the beginning of the year. (5) The head of the UAC added that the manufacturer of engines for the aircraft - Rybinsk NPO "Saturn" - presented its proposals on the timing of deliveries, but Fedorov did not disclose their essence. (6) SSJ-100 deliveries have already been delayed several times. (7) It was originally planned that the aircraft would be delivered to airlines at the end of 2008. (8) The dates were then moved to the end of 2009, and then to 2010. (9) At the end of last December, the Minister of Industry and Trade Viktor Khristenko announced that deliveries would begin in mid-2010. (10) in sukhoi civil aircraft, the delay was attributed to the late certification of the sam146 engine, which is being developed by saturn and the french company snecma. (1) До сих пор он смотрел на путешествия: (1) he had hitherto regarded travel as a hygienic measure, and had never felt tempted to leave europe. (2) his life was limited to munich and a hut in the mountains, where he spent rainy summers. (3) the idea of traveling, of taking a break from work for a long time, seemed to him disorderly and destructive, but then he thought that he still needed a change. (4) Aschenbach decided to spend two or three weeks in some corner of the gentle south. (5) the creator of the epic about the life of frederick of prussia, the author of the novel "maya" and the famous story "insignificant", the creator of the treatise "spirit and art", gustav aschenbach was born in l — district city of the silesian province, in the family of a prominent judicial official. (6) he made a name for himself while still a high school student. (7) Because of his poor health, the doctors forbade the boy to attend school, and he was forced to study at home. (8) On his father's side, Aschenbach inherited a strong will and self-discipline. (9) He began the day by dousing himself with cold water, and then for several hours honestly and zealously sacrificed to art the strength accumulated in his sleep. (1) Что я буду думать тогда, когда мне п: (1) What will I think when I have to die – if I am only able to think then? (2) Will I think that I have made poor use of life, overslept it, dozed off, failed to taste its gifts? (3) " How? is this already death? (4) So soon? (5) Impossible! (6) After all, I have not managed to do anything yet... (7) I was just going to do it!" (8) Will I remember the past, dwell on the few bright moments I have lived, on dear images and faces? (9) Will my evil deeds appear to my memory – and will the burning longing of late repentance come upon my soul? (10) Will I think about what awaits me beyond the grave... and does anything await me there? (11) No... it seems to me that I will try not to think – and forcibly engage in some nonsense, just to distract my own attention from the terrible darkness that is blackening ahead. (12) In my presence, a dying man kept complaining that they did not want to give him a bite of red-hot nuts... and only there, in the depths of his dimmed eyes, something was beating and fluttering, like the broken wing of a mortally wounded bird.
(1)Есть на нашей реке такие глухие и укр: (1) There are such remote and secluded places on our river that when you wade through the tangled forest thickets, filled with nettles, and sit down near the water, you will feel as if you are in a world fenced off from the rest of the earth's space. (2)The cherries have grown to their size future berries. (3) Now they are smooth, hard, as if cut from green bone and polished. (4)The leaves of the rakita are turned now with their bright green, now with the reverse, opaque, silver side, which makes the whole tree, its entire crown, everything, so to speak, a spot in the overall picture seem light. (5)at the water's edge, grasses grow, leaning to the side. (6) It even seems that beyond the grass they stand on tiptoe, stretching with all their might, so that they can look into the water, at least from behind their shoulders. (7) Here and nettle, here and tall umbrella, the names of which here we have no one knows. (8) But most of all adorns our closed earthly world is a certain tall plant with lush white flowers. (9)That is, each flower individually is very small and would be completely invisible, but the flowers gathered on the stem in countless numbers and form a lush, white, slightly yellowish cap of the plant. (10) And since its stalks never grow singly, the luxuriant caps merge, and now, as it were, a white cloud slumbers among the motionless forest grass. (11)It is also impossible not to admire this plant, because as soon as the sun warms up, invisible clouds of strong honey fragrance will float in all directions from the white flower cloud. (12)Looking at the white lush clouds of flowers, I often thought about the absurdity of the situation. (13) I grew up on this river, something I was taught in school. (14)these Flowers I see every time and not just see, but isolated from all other colors. (15)But ask me what they are called, I don't know why-we never hear their names from others here too grown people. (16)Dandelion, chamomile, cornflower, plantain, bell, lily of the valley – we still have enough for this. (17)These plants we can still call by name. (18)However, why generalize at once – maybe I'm the only one who doesn't know? (19)No, no matter who I asked in the village, showing white flowers, everyone threw up their hands: "Who knows! (20)There are plenty of them growing: both on the river and in the forest ravines." (By V. A. Soloukhin)
(1) Убежал заяц, а тигр камешки стал счи: (1) The hare ran away, and the tiger began to count the stones. (2) looks-not ten of them, but eleven. (3) The stones were reddened by the fire, and they became hot. (4) Greed overcame the tiger. (5) He seized a pebble and swallowed it. (6) So that the hare gets less. (7) I burned all my guts. (8) I almost went mad from the pain, I rushed to the mountains. (9) For a whole month he could not swallow anything, and he went hungry. (10) He wandered, wandered and again met a hare. (11) A hare sits near a thick bush in the middle of the field. (12) As the tiger roars: – Well, oblique, you will not deceive me a second time! (13) Because of you, I burned my gut, I went hungry for a whole month! (14) Now I will eat you! (15) The hare shakes with fear, but does not give a sign and says as if nothing had happened:-You know, uncle, how many sparrows are here! (16 (17) I'm hunting them! (18) You just open your mouth, I'll throw thousands of sparrows into it! (19) It's better than eating me alone. (20) The tiger looked and saw that sparrows were indeed flying over the bush.

(1) Казалось, неведомый автор давно подс: (1) It seemed that the unknown author had been spying on me for a long time, had learned everything about me and now told me: frankly and kindly, almost like a relative. (2) And so on every page. (3)"In youth, all the forces of the soul are directed to the future... (4) Only clear and shared dreams of future happiness make up the true happiness of this age." (5)So it is: every day of your childhood and adolescence, if they are normal, as if fused with the sun and light of waiting for your destiny to take place. (6) But how to express this nagging premonition aloud, can it be conveyed in words? (7)While you are tormented by an irresistible dumbness, this author-incognito managed to tell everything for you. (8) But who was he - the unknown author? (9)Whose magic book was in my hands? (10)Later I recognized it in the cover: "Childhood", "Adolescence", "Youth" by Leo Tolstoy. (11)That's how Tolstoy came into my life without introducing himself. (12)The illusion of recognition is an essential feature of classical texts. (13)Their authors are classics, because they write for everyone. (14) But they are also eternal classics because they write for everyone. (15)This is no less true. (16)The young simpleton, I "bought" it on the latter. (17)The experiment was conducted cleanly: the author was hidden. (18)The magic of the name did not prevail over the perception of the text. (19)The text itself has defended its greatness. (20)Tolstoy's "dialectic of the soul", first noted by Nikolai Chernyshevsky, who was ungracious to Vladimir Nabokov, flew like a ball lightning through a window, shining, into another unidentified reader's heart. (by D. K. Orlov)
(1) Виктор Франкенштейн оказался удивите: (1) Victor Frankenstein was a surprisingly intelligent and subtle man. (1) Зимой в окопах царило затишье: солда: (1) In winter, the trenches were quiet: the soldiers of the opposing armies were struggling with one enemy — the cold; they were ill with pneumonia and tried in vain to keep warm. (2) The relevant resolution was adopted by the deputies on June 7, Interfax reports. (3) deputies could not schedule elections for another date, since under federal law all elections, except for duma and presidential ones, are held on a single voting day (the second sunday of the month). (4) The Decision will be officially published within five days. (5) after that, the election campaign will begin. (6) Early elections in Moscow are scheduled in connection with the resignation of Sergei Sobyanin. (7) He decided that it was "not good" for Moscow to lag behind other regions where elections of heads of subjects will be held in the fall, and voluntarily resigned in order to participate in the elections. (8) Russian President Vladimir Putin supported his decision. (9) Sergei Sobyanin will go to the elections as a self-nominated candidate, and not from United Russia, of which he is a member of the Supreme Council. (10) At the same time, the party will support him. (11) It is already known that at least ten politicians will try to participate in the elections, including candidates from parliamentary parties, as well as opposition leader Alexey Navalny, Yabloko leader Sergei Mitrokhin, representative of the Civic Platform Mikhail Prokhorov and others. (12) Elections in Moscow will be held for the first time in 10 years. (13) The last election was held in 2003. (14) Yuri Luzhkov won it.
(1) Сотрудники Рижского регионального уп: (1) Employees of the Riga Regional Police Department detained a 31-year-old woman who threatened to organize a "bloodbath"in Latvia. (2) This is reported by DELFI. (3) The woman posted her threats on Facebook. (4) According to the portal, she claimed that she was preparing " bloody massacres similar to those that took place in Norway and the United States." (5) The police have opened an investigation into the death threat. (6) whether the detainee was found to have means to carry out threats (weapons, explosives), it is not reported. (7) The aforementioned mass murder in Norway was committed in July 2011. (8) there, a local resident, anders breivik, detonated a bomb outside the government building and then opened fire on the participants of the youth camp. (9) its victims were more than 70 people. (10) the terrorist confessed to the crimes committed, saying that he wanted to protest against the "expansion of muslims". (11) By court order, he was sentenced to 21 years in prison (the maximum term provided for by local law). (12) In 2012, a "Breivik follower" — 28-year — old Reinu Karu-was convicted in Estonia. (13) He threatened on Facebook "to arrange a mass massacre, to release a burst of automatic fire at people." (14) The police who searched the author of the threats did not find a weapon on him. (15) The court sentenced him to one year of probation and ordered him to see a psychiatrist.
(1) Народная артистка Украины, певица Ни: (1) people's artist of ukraine, singer nina matvienko cursed the leaders of the maidan. (1) Министр иностранных дел России Серге: (1) Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov called cynical and blasphemous statements by a number of deputies of the Rada about the terrorist attack in Grozny. (2) This is reported by TASS. (3) This is how the Russian Foreign Minister reacted to the words of two deputies of the Ukrainian parliament in support of the terrorist attack in Grozny. (4) " It's blasphemous, it's cynical. (5) I think there are even grounds for law enforcement agencies to consider this situation for a criminal case," Lavrov said. (6) On December 4, a deputy from the Popular Front, Yuri Bereza, and a deputy from the nationalist Radical Party, Igor Mosiychuk, supported an attack by militants on a traffic police post in Grozny, RT reports. (7) They also supported attempts to destabilize the situation in Russia and, in particular, in Chechnya. (8) Mosiychuk called on Ukraine to encourage events like Grozny not only in the Caucasus, but also in Central Asia. (9) On the night of December 4 in Grozny, militants attacked a traffic police post, killing three policemen. (10) Later, some of the attackers took refuge in the Press House, where they were subsequently destroyed. (11) the remaining group of bandits was liquidated in a school building located near the press house. (12) during the operation in the chechen capital, 10 policemen were killed and 28 were injured. (13) according to the head of chechnya, ramzan kadyrov, the attackers may be related to the brother of the destroyed terrorist leader doku umarov.
(1) В Бейлаганском районе Азербайджана п: (1) there was a conflict between the head of the local administration and an entrepreneur in the beylagan district of azerbaijan, the newspaper reports Haqqin.az. (2) as a result, according to the source, the businessman hit the official on the head with a brick. (3) the incident occurred on april 1 in a park near the local administration building. (4) The head of the district, Vagif Abdullayev, allegedly demanded money from entrepreneur Tarlan Kamaloglu (he is the owner of a cafe located in the park) for the development of the park. (5) The required amount was 10 thousand manats (one manat is approximately equivalent to one euro). (6) The businessman refused to Pay. (7) Then the official began to insult him. (8) "Unable to stand swearing at his family members, Tarlan Kamaloglu picked up a brick and hit the head of the district with it," the source said. (9) abdullayev fell from the blow, and his opponent allegedly began to beat him with his feet. (10) the brawl was stopped by local residents who were vacationing in the park. (11) the businessman was detained. (12) however, the head of the district allegedly gave instructions to release his abuser (what the victim was guided by is unclear). (13) the victim vagif abdullayev worked as a consultant in the presidential administration in the past, and later was a member of parliament. (14) he has been the head of the beylagan district administration since 2012. (15) the source also claims that abdullayev in the past allegedly extorted money from local officials, threatening them with dismissal.
(1) Однажды, в одно прекрасное тихое утр: (1) one fine quiet morning, two rabbit brothers were running from their burrow, which was in a clearing, into the forest. (2) The mushroom season was beginning, and all the animals were in a hurry to make good supplies for the winter. (3) The rabbits were running past a vegetable garden and suddenly saw that a huge carrot was growing in one of the beds. (4) The rabbits immediately salivated at what they saw. (5) They immediately jumped over the fence and, pushing, raced to the cherished carrot. (6) They reached the carrot at the same time and immediately pulled it out of the ground. (7) - My carrot!  one rabbit shouted. (8) - No, mine! – cried the other. (9) The brothers began to swear and shout at each other. (10) Here a hedgehog ran past the rabbits. (11) He was in a hurry to go to the forest for mushrooms. (12) - What are you doing here? - he was surprised, - who allowed you to run into someone else's garden? (13) Go better to the forest, for mushrooms! (14) The rabbits looked at him, but then they started again. (15) the Hedgehog shrugged his shoulders and went on.
\"(1) Футболист венгерского клуба \"Дебр: "(1) A football player of the Hungarian club "Debrecen" broke a window in the premises of the security post of the Consulate General of Poland in Kharkiv, RIA Novosti reports. (2) The incident occurred on the night of December 2, and on the evening of December 1, Debrecen played Metalist Kharkiv in a Europa League group match. (3) After the game, two players of "Debrecen" went for a walk in Kharkiv, and one of them, being in a state of alcoholic intoxication, struck several blows with his fist on the guard booth. (4) as a result, large cracks appeared on the glass.Both players were detained by A Military unit guarding the consulate and taken to the District police department. (5) after explanations, A report was drawn up on them and they were Released. (6) The names of the players are not given, only that one of them was born in 1977, and the second - in 1986. (7) the older player broke the glass. (8) The list of players of "Debrecen" on the official website of the club has two players born in 1977: defender Adam Komloshi and striker Peter Kabat. (9) As for the players born in 1986, there are three of them in the "Debrecen" team: defender Lasko Zsolt and midfielders Istvan Spitzmuller and Peter Sakaly. (10) The club has not yet commented on the incident in Kharkiv.The match "Metalist" - "Debrecen" ended with a score of 2: 1 in favor of the Ukrainian team. (11) After this victory, Metalist secured an early exit to the 1/16 finals of the Europa League. (12) Debrecen lost their chances of getting out of Group I long ago."
\"(1) Футбольный комментатор Василий Утк: "(1) Football commentator Vasily Utkin called the match of the 12th round of the Russian Football Premier League between Terek Grozny and Ural Yekaterinburg a match-fixing. (2) Utkin wrote about this on Tuesday, November 1, on his Facebook page. (3) "I consider the match" Ural " — "Terek" played on Sunday to be contractual. (4) Everything I know about match fixing is clearly visible in this match. (5) I had a clear idea that there was no wrestling in this match. (6) In any case, in the key episodes of this game that led to goals scored," Utkin wrote. (7) The commentator noted that the media preferred to call the meeting "questionable", avoiding the word "contractual". (8) In addition, he recalled the sharp drop in betting quotes during the match. (9) "No betting company has any experts who assess the integrity of the match by the actions of the players on the field online. (10) Quotes fall only if somewhere suddenly a lot of money is put on a certain result," Utkin added. (11) The match took place in Yekaterinburg on October 30 and ended with a 4:1 victory for the guests. (12) Ural led 1:0, four goals were conceded due to mistakes by the defenders and the goalkeeper of the hosts. (13) In addition, at half-time with the score 1:1 a number of bookmakers preferred Grozny, reducing the coefficient for the victory of "Terek" to a minimum. (14) Two days later, the head coach of the Yekaterinburg club, Vadim Skripchenko, resigned."
\"(1) В Свердловской области двух мужчин: "(1) In the Sverdlovsk region, two men were sentenced to imprisonment for organizing jumps from a bridge. (2) This was reported on the website of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation on April 7. (3) 38-year-old Mikhail Akulov and 31-year-old Yevgeny Stepura were each given four years in a penal colony. (4) They were found guilty of providing unsafe services resulting in the death of two people. (5) The accused remained at large until sentencing. (6) Akulov was taken into custody in the courtroom. (7) Stepura did not appear at the final court session, he was put on the wanted list. (8) According to the newspaper "Komsomolskaya Pravda", Stepura and Akulov led the group "Red Helmet", engaged in extreme jumping. (9) They offered people for 200-250 rubles to jump from a road bridge over the Iset River in the city of Kamensk-Uralsky. (10) Jumpers were tied with a rope. (11) In June 2010, tourists from Verkhnyaya Pyshma - Svetlana Lutfikramova, a 20-year-old physical education teacher, and Konstantin Chefanov, a 22-year-old rescue station worker-were rafting on the Iset. (12) A girl and a young man saw people jumping from the bridge and decided to try it too. (13) After receiving money from tourists, Akulov and Stepura tied them with belts and ropes and gave the command to jump. (14) However, the length of the ropes was calculated incorrectly, and Lutfikramova and Cefanov fell to their deaths on the ground."
(1) 43-летний кореец Ван Ко (One Goh), к: (1) 43-year-old Korean Wang Ko (One Goh), who is suspected of killing seven people at a private school in Oakland, California, told police about the motives for his actions. (2) This is reported by the San Jose Mercury News. (3) According to Ko, who was expelled from the university in November 2011, he was annoyed by the behavior of the administration and students of the educational institution. (4) As the suspect stated, he was treated disrespectfully there. (5) According to CNN, Ko, according to the police, does not feel remorse for his actions. (6) He confessed to the murders. (7) The shooting at the private Christian college Oikos University began on the morning of Monday, April 2, local time (in the evening of April 2, Moscow time). (8) The perpetrator shot dead six students and a secretary who worked at the university. (9) Three people were injured. (10) Ko surrendered to the authorities of the nearby city of Alameda without resistance. (11) The perpetrator's weapon has not yet been found. (12) Apparently, it was a semi-automatic pistol. (13) The police believe that the suspect acted alone. (14) Wang Ko is a naturalized U.S. citizen of South Korean origin. (15) As far as is currently known, he has not committed any previous crimes.
(1) Ростовщик сдал внаймы особняк, а лет: (1) The moneylender rented out the mansion, and began to spend the summer like a lord-in his new estates. (2) To all Derville's entreaties to take pity on the repentant Countess and her children, he replied that misfortune was the best teacher. (3) Let Ernest de Resto know the value of people and money — then it will be possible to return his fortune. (4) Having learned of the love of Ernest and Camille, Derville went once more to Gobseck and found the old man near death. (5) The old miser bequeathed all his wealth to his sister's great — granddaughter, a public wench nicknamed "Spark". (6) He entrusted his executor, Derville, with the disposal of the accumulated food supplies — and the lawyer did indeed find a huge supply of rotten pate, moldy fish, rotten coffee. (7) Towards the end of his life, Gobseck's avarice turned into a mania — he did not sell anything, for fear of losing money. (8) Derville concludes by saying that Ernest de Restaud will soon recover his lost fortune. (9) The Viscountess replies that the young Count must be very rich — only in this case can he marry Mademoiselle de Grandlieu. (10) However, Camille is not obliged to meet her mother — in-law, although the Countess is not allowed to enter the routs-after all, she was received in the house of Madame de Beauseant.
(1)Любите ли вы литературу так, как любл: (1) Do you love literature as much as I do?(2)I mean, do you like to read books?(3) costly occupation. (4) But that's how you look at it. (5)There are books that do not shorten life by the hours spent reading them, but lengthen it. (6)As if I had been to places I had never been, met people I would never have crossed paths with, they became close, often closer than friends, more real than friends, more open than the closest people. (7)A person learns from books what he already knew about himself, but did not know that he knew. (8)There are others. (9) The time spent on them is expunged from life. (10)It was like sitting in a useless meeting for three hours. (11)After such books, you only become more stupid. (12)The eternal problem of choice. (13)Electronic versions of thick magazines make life a little easier. (14)you can safely look through, look closely, sniff. (15)but printing is fast now, the book is published in two or three weeks. (16) and in" fat men " the editorial cycle is six months, or even more. (17)it is not surprising that many writers prefer not to contact the journals, but immediately take the manuscript to the publisher. (18)so it turns out: you go to any bookstore — your eyes run away, you want to buy everything. (19)like a hungry man in front of a sausage shop. (20)but you already know that not everything is edible. (By V. ivanov)
(1) Следующий Кубок мира по хоккею с шай: (1) The next Ice Hockey World Cup will be held in 2020. (2) this was stated by the president of the national hockey league players association (nhl) donald fehr. (3) his words are quoted by espn. (4) " The players and fans rated the tournament very positively. (5) the hockey players liked the format and level of the competition, liked that everything was held in one place and there was no need to fly anywhere. (6) we have to think about what can be improved. (7) the next tournament will be held in 2020, unless something extraordinary happens," fehr said. (8) The functionary also expressed confidence that the World Cup and the Olympic hockey Tournament can exist simultaneously. (9) The 2016 World Cup was held in Toronto and ended with the victory of the Canadian national team. (10) In the final, the hosts beat the European team twice (3:1 and 2:1). (11) The third World Cup was held under the auspices of the National Hockey League (NHL) with the assistance of the International Ice Hockey Federation (IIHF). (12) Meetings were held from September 17 to October 1. (13) The World Cup was contested by eight national teams, including Russia, which was ranked in the top four. (14) The World Cup was played at North American venues and according to NHL rules. (15) The details and calendar of the tournament can be found here.
(1) Создательница «Гарри Поттера» Джоан: (1) The creator of" Harry Potter " J. K. Rowling has published a new story about the wizard on the Pottermore website. (2) the 1,500 — word text is written on behalf of one of the characters in the book series-journalist rita skeeter, the guardian reports. (3) "reportage" tells the story of the reunion of the three main characters — harry, ron and hermione — at the 2014 quidditch world cup final. (4) All three take part in matches. (5) At the same time, Potter is 34 years old in history. (6) "he has a few silver threads in his hair, and he continues to wear round glasses that are more suitable for twelve — year-old boys," writes rita skeeter. (7) The text also describes the cut on the hero's cheek, which, according to the journalist, may be the result of his work as an obscurantist. (8) In addition, the story reveals some details of the lives of the children of the main characters. (9) The" article "is part of the book" History of the Quidditch World Cup", the first part of which appeared in March 2014. (10) "The Story" is the longest piece of original JK Rowling content ever published in the public domain. (11) The author will present another text in a journalistic style to readers on July 11. (12) According to The Guardian, it will describe the final match of the cup between Brazil and Bulgaria. (13) The reporter this time will be Ginny Potter, who in the story became the wife of the main character.
(1) Тед и Дэнни рады видеть Джейд в Голл: (1) Ted and Danny are happy to see Jade in Hollywood – especially Danny, who sees this as an opportunity to get close to the woman of his dreams... (2) The guys offer her to take the bedroom, and they will stay in the living room. (12) "i wonder if she sleeps naked?  says he is less interested in this issue Ted. (13) – you know, some girls do sleep naked, and i bet jade is one of them. (1) Сьюзан рассказывает Габи о том, что: (1) susan tells gaby that alejandro raped his own daughter. (2) and claudia (alejandro's second wife) decides to put the spy susan in her place. (1) Источник в правоохранительных органа: (1) A source in the law enforcement agencies of the Southern Federal District told RIA Novosti the names of three people suspected of preparing terrorist attacks in Astrakhan. (2) Ruslan Yablukov and Moussa Yasulov were among the detainees, and weapons and ammunition were found in their possession. (3) 30-year-old Andrey Antonov was killed during the arrest. (4) All suspects are local residents. (5) According to the agency's source, Antonov tried to detonate the bomb when the special forces appeared. (6) The report of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation states that the victim tried to resist and escape. (7) A RGD-5 grenade and a homemade revolver were found in his possession. (8) A Kalashnikov assault rifle with ammunition was found at Antonov's place of residence. (9) A total of 15 people were detained as a result of a special operation conducted in Astrakhan on the evening of May 7. (10) the involvement of most of them in illegal activities has Not Yet been confirmed. (11) law enforcement agencies assume that the bandits planned to commit Several terrorist attacks in astrakhan on may 9. (12) in addition to weapons and ammunition, religious and extremist Literature was seized from the detainees. (13) The special operation was carried out as part of the investigation of a criminal case of attacks on law enforcement officers in July-August 2010. (14) The FSB and the Ministry of Internal Affairs have received information that one of the suspects in this case, Maksut Zhumagaziev, may be in Astrakhan. (15) More than 10 searches were conducted in the city at addresses where people from Zhumagaziev's social circle live. (16) Bandits were found at one of these addresses.
(1) Жили-были два брата-ёжика. (2) Звали: (1) once upon a time there were two hedgehog brothers. (2) Their names were Tyap-Lyap and Tip-Top. (3) Both hedgehogs were very hardworking. (4) All summer long they worked from morning to night, gathering supplies for the winter. (5) In the summer it is good, there is plenty of food, and winter will come, what then to do? (6) what to eat? (7) So we have to think about the future, so as not to be lost in the cold winter days. (8) each brother had his own mink. (9) And in the mink of different lockers and shelves – apparently-invisibly! (10) It was there that they put all their supplies. (11) On the shelves of hedgehogs lay forest nuts, chestnuts, ripe acorns, and mushrooms, carefully dried by hedgehogs in the sun.
\"(1) Крис Мартин представил новую песню: "(1) chris martin has unveiled a new song by coldplay, according to nme. (2) The song was performed at the presentation of new Apple products held in San Francisco on September 1. (3) the song is called wedding bells. (1) С детства, со школьной скамьи челове: (1) From childhood, from school, a person gets used to the combination of the words "love for the motherland". (2) He realizes this love much later, and to understand the complex feeling of love for the motherland, that is, what exactly and for what he loves, is given already in adulthood. (3) The feeling is really complicated. (4) Here and native culture, and native history, all past and all future people, all the people managed to do throughout its history and what to make yet. (5) One of the first places in the complex feeling of love for the motherland is the love of native nature. (6) For a person born in the mountains, nothing can be more beautiful than rocks and mountain streams, snow-white peaks and steep slopes. (7) It would seem that to love in the tundra? (8) A monotonous swampy land with countless glassy lakes, overgrown with lichens, but the Nenets reindeer herder will not exchange his tundra for any southern beauty. (9) in short, this sweet steppe, others the mountains, others the sea, smelling of fish coast and who is a native of the Central Russian nature, the quiet beauty of the river with yellow water lilies and white lilies, kind, quiet sunshine of a small town... (10) And the lark sang above the field of rye, and to a birdhouse on a birch front porch. (11) It would be pointless to list all the signs of Russian nature. (12) But out of thousands of signs and signs there is that common thing which we call our native nature, and which, though we may love the sea and the mountains, we still love more than anything else in the whole world. (13) All this is so. (14) But I must say that this feeling of love to the native nature in us spontaneously, it not only appeared by itself, because we were born and raised in nature, but raised in the us literature, painting, music, those great teachers of ours who lived before us also loved the native land and gave his love to us, the descendants. (15) Does not remember from childhood, we memorized the best lines about the nature of Pushkin, Lermontov, Nekrasov, Alexei Tolstoy, Tyutchev, FET? (16) Did leave us indifferent, did not teach anything of the description of nature in Turgenev, Aksakov, Lev Tolstoy and Prishvin, Leonov, Paustovsky?.. (17) And the painting? (18) shishkin and levitan, polenov and savrasov, nesterov and plastov did they not teach and do not teach us to love our native nature? (19) a good and wise artist teaches us that nature is our not only material, but also spiritual wealth, knowledge of nature and love for it foster a sense of patriotism, a sense of humanity, kindness, develop a sense of beauty. (20) Generations of Russian people will learn this from Ivan Sergeyevich Sokolov-Mikitov, from Turgenev and Aksakov, from Nekrasov and Prishvin, from Paustovsky and Leonov. (by v. a. soloukhin*)
(1) Лидер российской группы «Машина врем: (1) The leader of the Russian group "Time Machine" Andrey Makarevich stood up for the Ukrainian conductor, which the management suspected of selling vodka after the artist's enthusiastic post on Facebook. (2) On Thursday, June 9, the singer left a new comment on the social network explaining the situation. (3) "I found out that thanks to the popularity of the post, the conductor is in big trouble-she allegedly sold me vodka illegally, they can deprive me of my job... (4) Hey, fellow bosses! Where did you read that she sold me vodka? (5) Went out to the station and bought! (6) Leave her alone! (7) You will lose the best people!" — wrote Makarevich. (8) On June 2, the artist shared on Facebook his impressions of the trip to the city of Dnipro, describing a delicious lunch prepared for him by the conductor. (9)The "bottle of vodka" was also mentioned. (10) According to Komsomolskaya Pravda, after this recording, the management of Ukrainian Railways called the conductor to a conference call. (11) Makarevich's note was interpreted as a message that 25-year-old Marina sells alcoholic beverages on the train, and this is prohibited. (1) Утром следующего дня Ансельм принаря: (1) On the morning of the next day, Anselm dressed up and went to Lindhorst. (7) The serpent raised its head and placed its tongue of red-hot iron on Anselm's chest. (8) He fainted from the sharp pain. \"(1) Студия Guerilla Games выпустит сбо: "(1) studio guerilla games will release a collection of killzone trilogy. \"(1) Омары, обитающие на побережье кана: "(1) Lobsters living on the coast of Canada's Halifax, became the heroes of the" reality show", which is broadcast around the clock on the Network. (2) The author of the idea was a local resident, a native of Germany, Ralph Picart, who installed a webcam in a crustacean trap, reports QMI Agency. (3) As Picart said, he has been working with webcams for several years. (4) According to Pickart, a few years ago, back in Germany, he intended to find a place to live in Halifax, watching the city through a webcam. (5) When he had finally moved in, he noticed that one of the city cameras that had helped him look at Halifax had disappeared. (6) Then he installed his own, with a view of the harbor, and since then has been interested in the arrangement of video surveillance devices. (7) Since 2009, Picart has maintained its own website novascotiawebcams.com, where you can connect to any of the 43 webcams installed in different locations in the province of Nova Scotia. (8) One of these cameras was recently installed in a lobster trap in Halifax Harbour. (9) In order to make an online "reality show" of the life of arthropods, Picart had to obtain a license to install a trap. (10) As indicated on the Halifax resident's website, all lobsters that fall into the trap are released after three to four days. (11) As Picart notes, lobsters do not suffer any injuries during their time in the trap. (12) The camera was launched in the trap a few days ago. (13) During the first day, the page dedicated to lobsters was visited 14 thousand times. (14) A day later, the number of visits increased to 30 thousand."

(1)Кроме стихотворных шедевров, Лермонто: (1) in addition to poetic masterpieces, lermontov left us prose ones, such as "hero of our time". (2) they are filled, like the verses, with the heat of his soul. (3)he lamented that he had wasted that heat in the great desert of his loneliness. (4) So he thought. (5)But time showed that he did not throw a single grain of this heat to the wind. (6)Many generations will love every line of this fearless and in battle, and in the poetry of an ugly and mocking officer. (7) One of the sure signs of masterpieces is that they stay alive in us for a long time, almost forever. (8)And we ourselves enrich them, as if we think out after the poet, we add what he did not finish. (9) New thoughts, images, feelings crowd into the head. (10)Each line of the verses flares up, just as every day the huge forests across the river are raging with autumn flames more and more. (11)Obviously, the property of a true masterpiece is to make us equal creators after its true creator. (12)It is widely believed that there are few masterpieces. (13)On the contrary, we are surrounded by masterpieces. (14)We do not immediately notice how they brighten our lives, what continuous radiation from century to century emanates from them, gives rise to high aspirations and opens up to us the greatest repository of treasures – our earth. (By K. G. Paustovsky)
\"(1) В ходе мероприятия, посвященного п: "(1) During the event dedicated to the celebration of Victory Day, Archbishop Zosima of the Russian Orthodox Church of Yakutsk and Lena died in Yakutsk. \"(1) В Москве 14 ноября состоится митин: "(1) A rally will be held in Moscow on November 14 to mark the second anniversary of the beating of the editor-in-chief of Khimki Pravda, Mikhail Beketov. \"(1) Премьер-министр России Владимир Пу: "(1) Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin, at a meeting with representatives of the Federation of Independent Trade Unions, praised Russian businessmen for the increased level of social responsibility during the crisis. (2) This is reported by Interfax. (3) "I watched how in 2009 some companies were really on the verge of crisis and bankruptcy. (4) Unlike in previous years, the owners - not all, but many - actually pulled out of their pockets already personal property in order to save enterprises and collectives," the Prime Minister said. (5) For comparison, he cited the situation in the country in 1998. (6) "It was just a shame to look at our business communities: they deceived each other, the country and employers, rushed around, trying to bite something off the state," RIA Novosti quotes Putin as saying. (7) Putin noted that businessmen have changed their attitude to their own business. (8)" Many people have begun to associate their own destiny with the country, with the companies and enterprises they own, " he said. (9) He did not give specific examples. (10) The Russian Prime Minister added that as the Russian economy returns to sustainable growth, the issue of revising the minimum wage will again become relevant. (13) The cost of living in the country in the fourth quarter of last year was 5,198 rubles."
(1) Хотя всякое промедление в поисках Мо: (1) Although any delay in finding Moby Dick is painful to Ahab, he cannot give up whaling altogether. (2) Rounding the Cape of Good Hope and crossing the Indian Ocean, the Pequod hunts and fills barrels with spermaceti. (3) But the first thing Ahab asks when he meets other ships is whether they have ever seen a white whale. (4) And the answer is often a story about how, thanks to Moby Dick, someone from the team was killed or maimed. (5) Even in the middle of the ocean, it is not without prophecies: a half-crazed sectarian sailor from an epidemic-stricken ship conjures to fear the fate of blasphemers who dare to engage in a struggle with the incarnation of God's wrath. (6) Finally, the Pequod meets an English whaler, whose captain, after harpooning Moby Dick, received a deep wound and lost his arm as a result. (7) Ahab hastens to come on board and speak to a man whose fate is so similar to his own. (8) The Englishman does not think of taking revenge on the sperm whale, but reports the direction in which the white whale has gone. (9) Again Starbuck tries to stop his captain — and again in vain. (10) At Ahab's request, the ship's blacksmith forges a harpoon of extra-hard steel, to which three harpooners sacrifice their blood. (11) The Pequod sails out into the Pacific.
(1) Однажды, гуляя по окрестностям город: (1) One day, while walking around the neighborhood of the town, Werther meets the crazy Heinrich, collecting a bouquet of flowers for his beloved. (2) Later, he learns that Henry was a scribe for Lotte's father, fell in love with a girl, and love drove him crazy. (3) Werther feels that the image of Lotte haunts him and he does not have the strength to put an end to his suffering. (4)At this point, the young man's letters end, and we learn about his future fate from the publisher. (5) Love for Lotte makes Werther unbearable to others. (6) On the other hand, gradually in the soul of a young man, the decision to leave the world becomes more and more strengthened, because he cannot simply leave his beloved. (7) One day, he finds Lotte sorting through presents for her family on Christmas Eve. (8) she asks him to come to them next time not before christmas eve. (9) For Werther, this means that he is deprived of the last joy in life. (10) Nevertheless, the next day he still goes to Charlotte, together they read a passage from Werther's translation of Ossian's songs. (11) In a fit of vague feelings, the young man loses control of himself and approaches Lotte, for which she asks him to leave her.
\"(1) Руководитель государственного коми: "(1) The head of the State Committee of Ukraine for the Development of Entrepreneurship, Mikhail Brodsky, in an entry in his blog, suggested that TV presenter Savik Shuster"took money from Yulia." \"(1) Студия Visceral Games, отвечающая: "(1) Visceral Games, the studio responsible for the development of Dante's Inferno, may in the future create a project based on the tragedy of William Shakespeare's Macbeth. (7) The project is created for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PSP consoles. (8) In December, a demo version of Dante's Inferno was released, which is available for download through the Xbox Live and PlayStation Network network services. (9) The game is published by Electronic Arts. (10) According to GameSpot, on April 29, an addition to Dante's Inferno will be released, which will allow you to play together, as well as create your own content. (11) The supplement was called Trials of St. Lucia. (12) Its cost and the platforms on which it will be available are not yet known."
(1)Многие считают понятие чести устарелы: (1)Many consider the concept of honor outdated, out of date, in the sense that it is not applicable today — not those conditions. (2) Others say: honor is now replaced by a higher concept — integrity. (3)Instead of a man of honor — a man of principles... (4) I remember the case associated with the name of A. P. Chekhov. (5) In 1902, the tsarist government annulled the election of Maxim Gorky as an honorary academician. (6)In protest, Korolenko and Chekhov renounced the title of academicians. (7)For Chekhov, this was not only a public act, but also a personal one. (8)He wrote in a statement that when Gorky was elected, he saw him and was the first to congratulate him. (9) and now that the academy of sciences has announced that the elections are invalid, it turns out that he, chekhov, as an academician, recognizes this. (10)"I congratulated cordially, and I recognize the elections as invalid — such a contradiction does not fit in my mind, I could not reconcile my conscience with it," he wrote to the Academy of Sciences. — And after much thought, I could only come to one decision... about resigning from me the title of honorary academician". (11)But such were the circumstances, seemingly independent of Chekhov, and he could find an excuse for himself. (12)Beliefs, of course, are a necessary thing. (13)But there is such a simpler, more concrete concept as a word given by a person. (14)It is not confirmed by any document or reference. (15)Just a word. (16)Let's say a business person who promised to make repairs by such and such a date, gather people, bring equipment, take those who came from far away. (17) You never know what else. (18)Well, eka trouble, did not accept, did not do, did not bring. (19)He'll do it in a month, take it in two days, and thank you for that. (20)It happens that there is really nothing terrible, no catastrophe, if you exclude one circumstance — the word, the word was given. (According to D. Granin)
(1) И г-жа Бержере не выдержала: она скл: (1) And Madame Bergeret could not stand it: she bowed her proud head of a representative of the glorious family of Pouilly and went to her husband to make peace. (1) Показ нового эпизода телесериала «До: (1) The screening of a new episode of the TV series "Doctor Who", in which the evil double of the main character's assistant shoots down a passenger plane with a rocket launcher, caused outrage among British viewers, reports the Daily Mail. Very insensitive of them." (7) Doctor Who is the longest — running science fiction series in the world. (8) It launched in November 1963 on the BBC. (9) Filming was stopped in 1989 and resumed in 2005. (10) The main character of the epic is an inventive alien Doctor Who, traveling through time and space in a machine called TARDIS. (11) The role of Doctor Who has been played by more than ten actors. (12) Since 2013, he has been played by Peter Capaldi. the airbus a321 of the russian company kogalymavia, flying from sharm el-sheikh to st. petersburg, crashed on october 31 in the sinai peninsula. (1) В ту пору жила неподалёку барыня Раи: (1) At that time there lived near the lady Raisa Vasilyevna Rysakova, or Rysachikha. (2) it is Owned by the village of Scutinise and brutally flogged men. (1) Бранд вырывается из рук крестьянина,: (1) Brand breaks free from the peasant's hands, and goes through the mountains. (1) На борту «Клотильды» все тяжело пере: (1) On board the Clotilde, everyone was grieving over Tom's death. (2) Kate Jordache was packing up: she was going home to England. (1) Аргонавты блуждают по неведомым запа: (1) The Argonauts wander the unknown western seas, the future Odyssey places. (2) They sail through the Aeolian Islands, and the king of the winds, Aeolus, at the request of Hera, sends them a fair wind. (3) They sail up to Scylla and Charybdis, and the sea goddess Thetis — the mother of Achilles, the wife of the Argonaut Peleus — lifts the ship on the wave and throws it over the sea gorge so high that neither monster can reach them. (4) They hear from afar the enchanting song of the Sirens, luring sailors to the cliffs — but Orpheus strikes the strings, and, having listened to him, the Argonauts do not notice the singing predators. (5) At last they reach the happy land of the Phaeacians — and here they unexpectedly encounter a second Colchian chase. (6)" Return Medea to us! " the pursuers demand. (7) The wise Phaeacian king replies: "If Medea is the runaway daughter of Aeetes, then she is yours. (8) If Medea is the lawful wife of Jason, then she belongs to her husband, and only to him." (9) Immediately, secretly from their pursuers, Jason and Medea celebrate their long — awaited wedding-in the sacred cave of Phaeacia, on a bed shining with a golden fleece. (10) The Argonauts sail on, and the chase is left with nothing.
(1) Депутаты Верховной Рады восьмого соз: (1) Deputies of the Verkhovna Rada of the eighth convocation staged the first brawl since the beginning of work. \"(1) Перед новым главой аппарата \"Спра: "(1) The new head of the staff of Fair Russia, Oleg Mikheev, was tasked with securing the party's second place in the State Duma elections. (2) The State Duma deputy himself told Kommersant about this. (3) Judging by the stated topics of the press conference to be held on December 10, the party plans to receive at least 25 percent of the vote in the 2011 elections. (4) For the sake of such a result, the party will carry out large-scale reforms within the organization. (5) More than half of the staff of the central office will be reduced, and the rest, according to Mikheev, will be assigned certain functions, and "not streamlined, as it was before." (6) Dismissals are carried out by order of the leader of "Fair Russia" Sergey Mironov. (7) 50 employees have already lost their positions, including the former Chief of Staff Vyacheslav Milyaev. (8) In addition, the party will establish its own sociological service. (9)" Some party ratings are put on the table for the top leadership of the country, and quite different ones are set out for the people, " he explained the need for his own institute. (10) As an example, Mikheev cited the spread of data from sociological surveys and the number of votes received by the spravorosy in the elections to the legislative Assembly of the Novosibirsk region. (11) Then sociologists promised "Fair Russia" 2 percent, and in the end 16 percent of voters voted for it. (12) This election campaign was supervised by Mikheev. (13) In the 2007 State Duma elections, the Spravorosy took fourth place, gaining 8.4 percent of the vote. (14) As a result, 38 deputies were elected to the Parliament."
(1) Тем временем гладиаторский флот был: (1) Meanwhile, the Gladiator fleet was ready, but Spartacus was unlucky — the wind and rough sea did not allow him to sail far. (2) Then the general built a fortified camp on a small peninsula. (3) Crassus, who soon arrived, decided to build a wall with a moat across the isthmus and trap Spartacus. (4) One night, when the wall was almost finished, the gladiators filled the moat with sandbags and left Crassus. (5) Soon after, the legions of Caius Gannicus broke away from the army of Spartacus. (6) This gave Crassus the opportunity to further weaken the gladiator army. (7) However, Crassus could no longer appropriate the laurels of victory — the famous Roman general Pompey, who had recently ended the war, came to his aid. (8) Spartacus learned this from a letter from Valeria, who warned him of the danger and begged him to surrender to Crassus, leave the army and hide in her estate. (9) Artorix, meanwhile, had learned the secret of Mirza, and assured the girl that it was not an obstacle for him. (10) Spartacus tried to negotiate with Crassus. (11) He wanted the Senate to spare his soldiers, but Crassus scornfully refused the gladiator, for whom the last hope of salvation had disappeared. (12) After sending Valeria a farewell letter, Spartacus led his army to the last battle and died.
\"(1) Госдума одобрила решение суда о за: "(1) The State Duma approved the court's decision to arrest in absentia the deputy from the LDPR faction Ashot Yeghiazaryan, accused of fraud. (2) This was reported on March 9 by RIA Novosti. (3) The court ordered the arrest in absentia on 31 January. (4) However, this step, as well as the decision to initiate a case, had to be approved by the State Duma (Yeghiazaryan still retains his deputy status). (5) "Yeghiazaryan, while remaining at large, exerts pressure on witnesses and other participants in criminal proceedings," Alexander Gurov, head of the Commission on mandate issues and issues of parliamentary ethics of the State Duma, told Interfax. (6) At the same time, the LDPR faction opposed the arrest. (7) As a result, 377 deputies voted for the arrest (the required quorum is 226 votes). (8) Yeghiazaryan left for the United States in the summer of 2010 and now lives in Los Angeles. (9) The case against the deputy was initiated in the autumn. (10) According to investigators, he deceived his business partners in the reconstruction of the hotel "Moscow" and the construction of the shopping center "Europark" on Rublevsky highway. (11) As part of the criminal case, Yeghiazaryan's property was seized, including Europark. (12) Yeghiazaryan himself claims that his conflict with his partners relates to arbitration, not criminal law. (13) In addition, the MP believes that he was wrongfully put on the international wanted list. (14) According to the accused, he cannot return to Russia because of fears for his life, but is ready to communicate with Russian investigators through American lawyers."
(1) На море разыгрывается шторм, перед е: (1) There is a storm at sea, before its ferocity Amy bitterly repents of her dissolute life, Roxanne silently echoes it, making promises to completely change. (1) Нападающий сборной России и «Краснод: (1) Forward of the Russian national team and "Krasnodar" Fedor Smolov commented on "R-Sport" parting with TV presenter Victoria Lopyreva. \"(1) Голливудский актёр Жан-Клод Ван Да: "(1) hollywood actor jean-claude van damme will play in the remake of the film "kickboxer", reports the hollywood reporter. \"(1) Юрий Лужков сдал должностной знак: "(1) Yuri Luzhkov handed over the official badge of the Mayor of Moscow, made of silver with gilding and decorated with semiprecious stones. (1) Когда начался гон, за Хуа-лу пришли: (1) When the rut began, the most powerful handsome horned men came for Hua-lu. (2) Precious antlers were now obtained with less labor and less injury to relict animals. (3) This very work, done in the subtropical seaside, amidst the unspeakable beauty, became for me a medicine, my zhen-shen. (4) In my dreams, I wanted, in addition to taming new animals, to "teach" the Chinese who worked with me, so that they would not depend on people like me, and could stand up for themselves. (5) However, there are periods of life that do not depend on personal desire: until the time has come, the conditions have not been created — the dream will remain a utopia. (6) And yet I knew that my root of zhen-shen was growing and I would wait for my time. (7) Do not give in to despair when you fail. (8) One of these failures was the flight of deer into the hills. (9) Hua-lu once stepped on the tail of a chipmunk that was eating beans that had fallen from her feeder. (10) The animal bit into her leg, and the doe, mad with pain, rushed to the side, followed by the whole herd, which had brought down the fences. (11) In the ruins of the nursery, how can I not think that Hua-lu is a witch who beckoned with her beauty and turned into a beautiful woman, who, as soon as I fell in love with her, disappeared, plunging into melancholy. (12) As soon as I began to cope with it, breaking the enchanted circle with creative force, Hua-lu broke it all.
\"(1) Мотоциклист Александр Ишутин, подр: "(1) Motorcyclist Alexander Ishutin, who fought with the singer Yuri Antonov, partially admitted his guilt in court and offered to conclude a settlement agreement. \"(1) Торговцы вещевого рынка у станции: "(1) Traders of the clothing market near the Krasnogvardeyskaya metro station in the south of Moscow have stopped their hunger strike, having obtained permission to extend its work. (3) According to the source, on April 5, traders met with representatives of the prefecture of the district and accepted the offer of the authorities to extend the operation of the market, which was closed in February, for three months. (4) "All ten people stopped their hunger strike and went home," Gorshechnikov said. (5) - The state of health of all is satisfactory." (6) During the time allotted for the operation of the market, as explained by Gorshechnikov, entrepreneurs expect to sell all the goods in order to return at least part of the money spent. (7) At the same time, work on the dismantling of structures will begin, while the issue of new retail spaces for businessmen will be discussed. (8) As Marina Matveeva, a member of the initiative group of market employees, told RIA Novosti, trading resumed on April 6. (9) Krasnogvardeysky Market was closed on February 1, 2011. (10) According to entrepreneurs, they were informed about the upcoming termination of work on January 26. (11) Traders held several protests. (12) On April 1, about 50 people came to the Moscow City Hall, ten people went on a hunger strike. (13) Nikita Kuznetsov, Deputy Head of the Department of Trade and Services, came out to meet the protesters. (14) He promised that the issue of the market's fate would be resolved in the near future."

(1) Когда-то давно ленивец и хамелеон др: (1) Once upon a time, a sloth and a chameleon were friends. (2) One day they went together to cultivate their common field. (3) - Chameleon, let me cut the grass, and you beat off the boundaries of our field, - said the sloth. (4) The Chameleon quickly finished the task, and then the sloth suggested: - Chameleon, let me cut down the trees, and you cut the remaining grass. (5) The chameleon agreed, began to work, and soon cut the grass all over the site. (6) Then the sloth said, " Chameleon, you will cut down the trees, but I will harvest them later." (7) He agreed again, cut down all the trees, cleared the land, and sowed Eleusis. (8) Tired chameleon like a dog! (9) But when the eleusis was ripe, the sloth said to his friend, " Chameleon, you will go and gather the eleusis, and then I will dry it in the sun and pound it." (10) The chameleon gathered Eleusis and said: "Give me some of Eleusis, too, or my children will starve to death." (11) But the sloth kept all the harvest for himself. (12) The chameleon, thin and weak from work and hunger, went to the chief to demand judgment on the sloth. (13) The chief summoned them both. (14) The sloth immediately began to resent.
(1) Аниматор и геймдизайнер Монти Оум ум: (1) animator and game designer monty oum died in hospital on february 2 at the age of 33. (2) Before that, he had been in a coma for ten days. \"(1) Среди пострадавших от взрыва газов: "(1) There are no Russian citizens among the victims of the explosion of gas balloons on Republic Square in Yerevan. (2) This was reported on May 5 by the Interfax news agency. (3) "We contacted representatives of the Ministry of Emergency Situations and the Armenian Police. (4) According to the latest data, there are no citizens of the Russian Federation among the victims," press Attache of the Russian Embassy in Armenia Sergey Abelyan told reporters. (5) The explosion occurred on May 4. (6) Balloons filled with gas were used to decorate the square where the concert and rally of the ruling Republican Party of Armenia took place. (7) 154 people were injured, 76 of them still remain in hospitals (including 25 people in intensive care). (8) After the explosions, the crowd began to panic (RIA Novosti clarifies that some of the wounded were injured during the stampede). (9) However, the concert and rally were then continued. (10) "Law enforcement agencies have already launched an investigation, the perpetrators will be found and brought to justice in accordance with the law," Armenian President Serzh Sargsyan said. (11) Press Secretary of the Armenian Police Ashot Aharonyan said that it is too early to put forward any theories, but the police will soon make an official statement. (12) Meanwhile, some media outlets have put forward a version according to which a lit cigarette was the cause of the explosion. (13) It is also assumed that the designers of the event could not fill the balloons with safe helium (the prices of which have recently increased), but with oxygen or hydrogen in order to save money."
(1) Туристический пансион в Братиславе о: (1) A tourist boarding house in Bratislava refused to accept a group of students from Turkey. (2) Representatives of the hostel explained this decision for security reasons. (3) This is reported by the Slovak newspaper Pravda. (4) When students tried to book one week's accommodation at the Stella Boarding House online, they received a letter in broken English, one of the students, Ibrahim Taha Uyar, said on Facebook. (5) "For security reasons, we do not accommodate Turkish and Arab citizens. (6) We cannot accept this order. (7) We are very sorry," the August 1 letter said. (8)" Funny racism that made me laugh today, " commented Uyar. (9) "Share it and stop it," the student urged social media users. (10) According to a Turkish citizen, in a reply letter, he and his friends accused the staff of the boarding house of racism. (11) In response to this, the institution noted that they simply observe reasonable caution and take care of their customers. (12) The representatives of the boarding house explained that they do not accommodate citizens of those countries where military conflicts or coups occur. (13) As a result, the students found another place to stay in Bratislava. (14) The Turkish Embassy in Slovakia condemned the actions of Stella employees. (15) The Foreign Ministry also criticized them. (16) The head of the Ministry's press service, Igor Skocek, said that such behavior is discriminatory and violates human rights.

(1) Окубата приходит к Сатико и рассказы: (1) Okubata comes to Sachiko and tells her that Taeko is taking sewing lessons, intending to become a milliner. (2) To do this, she is going to go to Paris for six months or a year. (3) Okupata believes that tinkering with dolls is not shameful, but the girl from a good family ought not to earn money by sewing. (4) the makioka sisters do not like the spoiled barchuk okubata, but here sachiko agrees with him and promises to talk to taeko. (5) in addition to sewing, taeko is engaged in traditional dances, dreaming of obtaining a diploma that would allow her to open her own school in the future. (6) At a concert organized by the Osaka Daughters Society, the students of the Yamamura School show their art, and a local photographer, Itakura, who studied his craft in America, photographs them. (7) A month after the concert, there is a flood. (8) Fortunately, neither Sachiko's house nor the school where her daughter Etsuko is studying were damaged, but Taeko, who finds herself in the house of sewing teacher Noriko Tamaki, almost dies. (9) Itakura, risking his life, saves her. (10) Yukiko hurries to visit her sisters, whom she has not seen for more than two months.

(1) Футбольный клуб «Краснодар» обыграл: (1) FC Krasnodar beat Azerbaijan's Gabala on their own field and won their first victory in the group stage of the Europa League. (10) Another Russian club, Rubin, drew 0-0 at home against French side Bordeaux and has one point after two rounds. (11) The Kazan team is last in Group B. (1) Россия запретила поставки говядины,: (1) Russia has banned the supply of beef, pork, fruit, poultry, cheese and milk from the EU, USA, Australia, Canada and Norway. (2) This was stated by Russian Prime Minister Dmitry Medvedev. (3) Restrictions are imposed from August 7 for a period of one year. (4) The food embargo did not affect baby food. (5) The Government resolution is published on the website of the Cabinet of Ministers. (6) " In pursuance of the presidential decree, I have signed a government decree. (7) Russia introduces a total ban on deliveries of beef, pork, fruit and vegetable products, i.e. fruit and vegetables, meat, poultry, fish, cheese, milk and dairy products", — Medvedev said, starting a government meeting on Thursday. (8) He recalled that on the eve of Russian President signed a decree "On applying certain special economic measures to ensure security of the Russian Federation". (9) "in fact, we are talking about the embargo on importing entire categories of products from those countries that have imposed economic sanctions against Russian organizations and citizens", — said the Prime Minister. (10) Medvedev recalled that "for a long time, our country did not respond to sanctions that some States have imposed against Russia." (11) " until recently, we hoped that our foreign colleagues would understand that sanctions are a dead end, they are not needed by anyone. (12) but they did not understand. (13) and the situation has developed so that we are forced to take retaliatory measures," the head of the cabinet stressed.
(1)3емля — космическое тело, а мы — косм: (1) 3the earth is a cosmic body, and we are astronauts making a very long flight around the Sun, along with the Sun through the infinite universe. (2) The life support system on our beautiful ship is so ingeniously designed that it is constantly self-renewing and thus provides the ability to travel for billions of passengers for millions of years. (3) It is difficult to imagine astronauts flying a ship through outer space, deliberately destroying a complex and delicate life support system designed for a long flight. (4)But gradually, consistently, with amazing irresponsibility, we put this life-support system out of order, poisoning rivers, reducing forests, spoiling the World's oceans. (5) If on a small spacecraft astronauts start fussily cutting wires, unscrewing screws, drilling holes in the skin, it will have to qualify as suicide. (6) but there is no fundamental difference between a small ship and a large one. (7) It is only a matter of size and time. (8)humanity, in my opinion — is a peculiar disease of the planet. (9)3 microscopic beings, on a planetary, and even more so on a universal scale, have appeared, multiply, and swarm. (10)They accumulate in one place, and immediately appear on the body of the earth deep ulcers and various growths. (11) It is only necessary to introduce a drop of harmful (from the point of view of the earth and nature) culture into the green coat of the Forest (a team of loggers, one barrack, two tractors) — and now a characteristic, symptomatic, painful spot spreads from this place. (12)Scurry, multiply, do their thing, eating the bowels, depleting soil fertility, poisoning poisonous shipments, its rivers and oceans, the Earth's atmosphere. (13)unfortunately, as vulnerable as the biosphere, it is equally defenseless against the pressure of the so-called technological progress are concepts such as silence, solitude and intimacy with nature, with the beauty of our land. (14)On the one hand, a person who is disturbed by the inhuman rhythm of modern life, crowding, a huge flow of artificial information, is weaned from spiritual communication with the outside world, on the other hand, this external world itself is brought into such a state that it sometimes does not invite a person to spiritual communication with it. (15)It is not known how this original disease, called humanity, will end for the planet. (16)Will the Earth have time to develop some kind of antidote?(By v. Soloukhin*)
(1) Россиянин Сергей Бобровский, признан: (1) Russian Sergey Bobrovsky, recognized as the best goaltender in the NHL at the end of the 2012-13 season, has extended his contract with the Columbus Blue Jackets. (8) Under the previous contract, his salary was 900 thousand dollars. (9) Taking into account bonuses, a Russian could receive $ 1.75 million. (10) A Russian was recognized as the best goalkeeper in the NHL for the first time. (11) The Russian was also claimed by SKA St. Petersburg, which offered the player a contract. (12) It was in this team that Bobrovsky played during the NHL lockout. (13) At the end of the season, Bobrovsky received the Vezina Trophy. (1) Я за него ещё хотела спрятаться, но: (1) I still wanted to hide behind him, but when I realized that he was afraid, that he was dying in front of my eyes, I suddenly stopped being afraid and felt that I was not afraid of anything. (2) She took his hand in hers and squeezed it tightly, so that he would know that he was not alone in this world, that he had a true friend who could protect him. (3) And I thought he understood that and sort of nodded to me. (4) A terrible silence followed these three minutes, this waiting, and everyone looked at each other in fear, trying to guess in advance who the traitor was. (5) I looked at Dimka − he stood rooted to the spot. (6) I wanted to yell at him in a terrible voice, to hit him to move him, to force him to confess before Mironova called his name. (7) Then I again rushed headlong forward to help him. (8)I stared at Dimka, boring him with my eyes, so that he would understand that it was time for him to admit that there was not a single free second left. (9) But again he was silent, as if he did not understand my views. (10)But my breath caught, I could not say Dimka's name. (11) And suddenly, for some reason, I smiled and said something completely different from what I was going to say.. (12) "i did it!." (by v. k. zheleznikov)
\"(1) Программист из Бангкока арестован: "(1) A programmer from Bangkok was arrested for insulting King Bhumibol Adulyadej of Thailand on the social network Facebook. (2) This is reported by Agence France-Presse. (3) Under Thai law, Suparak Phuchaiseng faces a prison sentence of up to 15 years. (4) Recently, this is not the first time that Thai citizens have been held accountable for political statements on the Internet. (5) For example, in March 2011, a webmaster of an opposition resource that published critical statements about the monarchy was sentenced to 13 years in prison. (6) In early July, the Phya Thai party, which had been in opposition for several years, won the elections in Thailand. (7) in august, yingluck shinawatra, the sister of former prime minister thaksin shinawatra, who has been in exile since 2009, became prime minister. (8) however, the new authorities have not yet relaxed the legislation in the field of internet regulation. (9) They were encouraged to do so by 100 academics from around the world who sent an open letter to the Thai authorities. (10) Academics have stated that the current laws violate human rights to freedom of expression. (11) The 83-year-old King of Thailand Bhumibol Adulyadej performs a purely ceremonial function in the country, some residents revere him as a deity. (12) Since 2009, Adulyadej has been in hospital with pneumonia. (13) Insulting the royal family is considered a serious criminal offense in Thailand, and any critical discussion of the King's activities is strictly prohibited."
(1) Лейтенант не чувствовал за собой ник: (1) The lieutenant did not feel any guilt about what happened to him on the front line, or that he decided to return from the ambulance company to the trench. (2) the general had no intention of sending him back to the ambulance company, although he saw that he needed it. (3) The pale, haggard face, the sunken cheeks, the tunic stained with soot and soot, the torn belt, the whole appearance of a very young platoon commander standing at attention – all this caused the general to have other thoughts. (4) He was thinking about how much will there must be in a person if, having experienced fear and terror like this, he not only did not lose heart, but became even stronger and stronger. (5)the general looked once more into volodin's stubborn face. (6)he realized that he didn't need any words of approval or praise right now. (7)The General simply held out his hand and said, " Good luck, Lieutenant!" (8)Combat good luck! (9) The"Willis" had already disappeared around the bend, and Volodin was still standing on the highway in thought. (10)There was something very important to him in this casual, momentary encounter that he could not immediately understand. (11)What he could not understand then, standing on the highway, will suddenly be revealed to him in one simple phrase that Volodin will hear from a member of the Military Council of the front when he meets him seven days later in the liberated Ryndinka, on the outskirts still smoking from the battle: "We are Russian soldiers!" (12)Perhaps because the word "soldier "in this combination rose above all military ranks, even over the general's, even over the marshal's rank, and the word" Russian " connected with the history of Russia, with its best pages: the Battle of Borodino, the Sevastopol epic. (13)But perhaps because Volodin himself felt all this and only could not express his feelings in one phrase, now, hearing this phrase, he suddenly realized how simple, how obvious the truth is, and proudly repeated it in his mind: "We are Russian soldiers!" (According to A. A. Ananyev*)

(1)Нет такого вопроса — «Зачем учиться?»: (1) There is no such question — "Why study?" (2)How much the world is worth, everyone who had the opportunity, learned. (3) there is one simple and business-like question: what are the real opportunities for me to get a good education?(4)how can i take advantage of these opportunities?(5)anyone who understands what to live for, what to learn for (this is, in fact, the same thing), who understands that only in teaching the soul grows and human desires appear in it, will learn intensely and joyfully. (6)education is given, education is received.. (7) But you still need to be able to take it!(8)once, scientists asked a large group of children a simple question: "do you think the results of the study correspond to your capabilities?" (9) more than half of the high school students answered: "no, they do not." (10)and in the last grade, almost seventy percent of the kids think they could have done better. (11)what is stopping them?(12)maybe not enough ability, hard to learn?(13)All the guys, as one, answered: "No! "(14)Of course, it is more difficult for some people to learn than others, people have different abilities, but "harder" does not mean "impossible". (15)No one complains about their abilities, and that's right, it's fair. (16)The problem is different. (17)Most of the children complain that they lack organization and lack sufficient interest in learning, in school. (18) But these two reasons can be combined into one, because the one who is interested in learning never suffers from laziness and disorganization. (19)this is the main reason for our school troubles and troubles, this is what prevents many of us from getting a decent education: the inability to become interested in learning!(20)Meanwhile, only the love of knowledge, of school, gives the strength to overcome the ten-thousandth array of lessons (ten classes is about ten thousand lessons) and get a good secondary education. (by s. l. soloveitchik*)

(1) На Фаворе собираются все ученики Иис: (1) All the disciples of Jesus, all the poor whom he healed by His power, all the humble in spirit, gather together at Tabor. (2) Lazarus exhorts them to " bear with patience the cruel torments, the mockery, and the malicious hatred of those who do not know God," for they are already preparing from above to shed their blood for Him. (3) Those who come to see the Savior of the world ask Him to strengthen them on the path to a high goal. (4) Mary raises a prayer to heaven: "Eternal praise to You there in heaven, eternal praise to You here on earth, to You who have redeemed the human race." (5) Christ descends from the top of Tabor and addresses the people. (6) He says that he will come for everyone in the hour of his death, and whoever fulfills His commands, He will lead him to "the bliss of that life beyond the grave and eternal." (7) He prays to the All-good Father for the elect, for those to whom the holy mystery of Redemption is revealed. (8) Accompanied by the Apostles, Christ ascends to the top of the Mount of Olives. (9) He stands in "wondrous majesty" surrounded by God's chosen ones, resurrected souls, and angels. (10) He commands the Apostles not to leave Jerusalem, and promises that the Spirit of God will descend upon them. (11) "Let the Merciful Himself look upon you, and He will send down eternal peace to your souls!" A bright cloud descends, and on it the Saviour ascends to heaven.
(1) С большей частью героев мы встречаем: (1) We meet most of the characters at Tantamount House, whose owner, Hilda Tantamount, is hosting a musical evening. \"(1) Социальная сеть \"ВКонтакте\" ввел: "(1) The social network VKontakte has introduced a rating of user blogs. (4) The new feature allows users to find the most interesting authors and subscribe to their publications," said Tsyplukhin. (5) There are two ways to subscribe to microblogs: you can add a user as a friend or become a "fan"of the user. (6) In the near future, according to Tsyplukhin, "fans" are planned to be renamed "subscribers". (7) in addition, following the popularity rating of blogs, a rating of users themselves will be created. (8) The reform of VKontakte in October 2010, which included a change in the design of the user page, was ambiguously perceived by users. (9) They even organized several protests on the Internet, creating groups demanding the return of the traditional wall and disabling microblogging. (10) Several hundred thousand people participated in the actions.
